statements: UPDATE power_grid_performance SET power_consumed = 500 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE power_grid_performance SET power_consumed = power_consumed + 500 WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
UPDATE power_grid_performance SET power_consumption = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE power_grid_performance SET voltage = 220 WHERE id = 2;

UPDATE outages_prevention SET success_rate = 0.9 WHERE grid_id = 101;
UPDATE power_grid_performance SET voltage = voltage + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE power_grid_locations SET city='New City' WHERE location_id=1;
UPDATE power_grid_devices SET device_name='New Device' WHERE device_id=2;
UPDATE power_grid_readings SET reading_value=50.5 WHERE reading_id=3;
UPDATE power_grid_locations SET city='New City' WHERE state='New York';
UPDATE power_grid_devices SET device_type='Smart Meter' WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM power_grid_locations WHERE state='California');
UPDATE power_grid_readings SET reading_value=45.6 WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
UPDATE PowerPlants SET capacity = 1000 WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE Transformers SET capacity = 500 WHERE transformer_id = 1;
UPDATE GridLines SET length = 200 WHERE line_id = 1;
UPDATE PowerPlants SET capacity = capacity + 100 WHERE plant_name = 'Solar Power Plant';
UPDATE Transformers SET capacity = capacity * 1.1 WHERE power_plant_id = 1;
UPDATE GridLines SET length = length - 10 WHERE line_name = 'Main Grid Line';
